website_summaries.verdict: Although the non-stick surface may be disappointing to some owners, many more are impressed with this pan's features and spacious interior.
pros: Boasts a slick, non-stick surface that makes scraping and scooping waste easier than many competing models
Surface is also antimicrobial, which cuts down on odor absorption
Plastic construction has a durable feel, and interior is roomy enough for several cats
cons: Non-stick feature may become less effective over time
Litter spews easily over the low front panel

customer_reviews.title: This pan is the perfect size, nice depth to prevent litter going every ...
customer_reviews.text: Who knew cat sh!t would be so complicated? This pan is the perfect size, nice depth to prevent litter going every where. I only knocked off one star because the durability of the finish was a little lack luster. I suppose you should purchase the scooper they recommend as my regular one has scuffed the bottom of the pan.
customer_reviews.author: L_H

customer_reviews.title: Nonstick peeling off after one month.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this box for about a month, and already the non-stick coating is peeling off on the bottom. We use a non-stick scoop so that is not the problem, and we we scoop several times a day. I'm afraid to keep using it because of the peeling. Very disappointed. Wish we hadn't even tried it so we could return it. I"ll never buy their products again.
customer_reviews.author: Anieema

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of the non stick surface, but after the very first cleaning, there were all kinds of scratches on the bottom of the pan. So I paid the higher $$$$ I even bought the scooper that was recommended for this box. Save your money......
customer_reviews.author: L. Gallen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic litter box!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve spent more money on “nonstick” litter boxes in hopes that one of them would actually work and they never did...until now. As soon as I took this one out of the box I knew it was different. The material it’s made of is not like any other litter box which is why it’s so frickin easy to clean!! It’s incredibly sturdy and my cat doesn’t make a mess outside the box when he scratches his litter. I do believe I’m going to replace his other boxes with this one when I get home from my travels. Update: still the best litter box ever! NOTHING sticks in this thing! Just amazing 😁😁😁
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this product to work as claimed, but sadly it does not seem to. I have used it for about a week and every time the cat pees it sticks to the bottom of the box. There seems to be a lot of other reviews say that it does work as claimed. Am I just missing something? Does my cat have extra sticky pee???
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Leroux

customer_reviews.title: This product is great. So well made
customer_reviews.text: I've had cats my entire life and have used many different litter boxes. This product is great. So well made, but the best feature is how easy scooping now is. Nothing sticks to the pan and the scoop just glides over the bottom. Best I've ever tried.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great, but expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Great product but expensive. I paid $29.99, now it's listing for $39.99. Why? But it is the best litter box I've purchased to date (and I've bought quite a few). My 20 year old cats needed high walls to keep their urine from topping out over the edge, yet an entrance low enough to get into it. The non stick service is great too. Cleans up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: I had to return this kitty litter box because the ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this kitty litter box because the opening was not low enough for my 20 year old kitty. I have been using puppy pads but they smell so I need a kitty litter with a lower entry,
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Doolittle

customer_reviews.title: Best One
customer_reviews.text: This is the best litter box I have ever purchased and I have purchased many. My garage is a testament to a number of them still. Nothing sticks to it. It is large enough for the cat to turn around and he seems to like it. The rounded edges make it easier to clean. Waiting for the non-stick scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne R. Fox

customer_reviews.title: I was so excited about trying this product, however it is a complete disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about trying this litter box, however it is a complete disappointment. Cat urin sticks to the sides and bottom terribly- just like any cheap litter box. I even use the brand of litter pictured! I am now out a lot of money for a regular box that is still difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: N. Nessay

customer_reviews.title: Not for large cats
customer_reviews.text: If you have a big cat like I do --- Ragdoll -- then this cat box is not for you. I LOVE the material as it is easy to scoop --- but my large cat doesn't fit in well and every time she left her #1 all over the floor or mat --- a huge mess that I was trying to fix with these. Alas, I now have to litter boxes that can't be used.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cheslin

customer_reviews.title: The box itself is sturdy, heavy gauge material
customer_reviews.text: It's difficult to find a litterbox for larger cats and this fits the bill. The box itself is sturdy, heavy gauge material. The nonstick coating is a great addition – time will tell how durable it is, but it really helps when cleaning out the litterbox. The large radius curve at the base seems to help keep kitty from piling things up in one corner, which is a plus. It makes it a little more finicky to scoop than something with straighter walls, but I can't really complain. Five stars, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: We had the budda dome (like catmate dome step in) and thought I liked that. A little background, we have a fit 13lb cat (so he's just a big cat) and he loves to bury his business. One day he refused to enter the domed litter box so we took the lid off and problem solved but then he tracked litter everywhere. I tried to sifter pans but those weren't big enough for his highness. Then I got this bad boy litter box and whew. The litter slides out when cleaning, it's amazing. He can't throw litter out of it and the tracking is down considerably. Hands down my favorite litter box so far.
customer_reviews.author: SKendall24

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep cats urine in the box...
customer_reviews.text: I have an 8 lb. cat and a 6.5lb cat and the sides aren't high enough to contain her pee. Really disappointed; I'm sorry I tried it. Also, the non stick doesn't really seem to work all that well. I use lightweight litter, so maybe that's an issue, but I'm not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: jaelyn

customer_reviews.title: Nonstick great but cats kick a lot of litter out
customer_reviews.text: Great nonstick BUT cats bury their stuff and the litter gets kicked and scratched out of the box. Usually about 1/4 cup flies with each use. Make it without the entry cut out so the litter stays in the box and I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaC

customer_reviews.title: TOO Non-Stick?
customer_reviews.text: When is a "non-stick" litter box too non-stick? When your cat will not use it because the litter acts like quicksand. The pan provides so little resistance to litter movement that when my cat steps into the box, all the litter shifts and her poor paws sink. She used it once, and I found litter all over the floor in front of the box (more than normal). But, a couple days later I found a pee puddle right in front of the box. She has another litter box upstairs (not as slick) so I don't know why she didn't just use that one. I guess I'll have to search for another replacement.
customer_reviews.author: GreggN

customer_reviews.title: Best box ever
customer_reviews.text: I have had indoor cats my entire life and I'm 65....in all that time I have never found a more incredible liter box. The weight, material and design of the box is the best ever. The soiled liter etc. never sticks to the sides or the bottom of the box making it so easy to clean. I highly recommend this liter box, you won't be disappointed. It is well worth the price....
customer_reviews.author: D. Gackle

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like it, but it was doomed from the start
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, worked great for 1 month, but cat litter is COURSE. So after a month of cleaning, it was like someone had taken sandpaper and scrubbed down the sides with it. All the smoothness was gone, everything stuck to the sides again. I cannot see how this would work unless you used powder for litter.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: it's nice and big for my 2 cats, and since the front is lower for my 17 1/2 yr old cat, he gets in easier....the teflon coating is great but i also spray a spray powder deodorant on the box before i put the litter in it, double protection from sticking to bottom of pan...i only have this for 2 days but i'm very satisfied and so is Patches & Presley :) UPDATE......still love the box but the teflon coating is coming off and it's not even a month and i don't use a metal scooper on it only plastic
customer_reviews.author: cg gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, but expensive and VERY slippery for the cat
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our elderly cat because of its low entry. However, once he got in it, he slipped and slid on the antibacterial surface and we had to put a rubber mat underneath the litter. We use Feline Pine style litter, not the normal granular litter so I don't know if that makes a difference. Anyway, it was a bit expensive as litter boxes go, and served the purpose for a couple of months, but the slipperiness (which makes it easy to clean) was a detriment, in our case. Our poor guy passed away recently.
customer_reviews.author: Retired sailor

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible item. I would not recommend to anyone. Too curved, hard to clean and the outer (first) layer of surface material peels off. I wish I could return them and get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Nun ya

customer_reviews.title: Best non-stick box ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Pet Fusion nonstick litter box and perfusion cat litter scoop.... I am so impressed with these products!!! The clumps do not stick to the litter box, because of the non stick surface, this box is super easy to scoop clean! No more scraping and hacking the clumps off the box! Because the litter doesn’t stick...it doesn’t become the muddy clump! I appreciate the high sides and the one lower entrance on the front for cats to enter! This litter box/scoop has made the not so fun chore of cleaning the litter box...quicker and cleaner!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marisakay

customer_reviews.title: Easy to scoop
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of this litter box. It is slightly more square than the rectangular ones I was using. My cats seem to appreciate the size of it too. They now use this one much more often than the old one, which is right next to it. But they have manged to pee over the edge a couple times in the past several months that I have had it. So I will keep an eye out for a higher sided one I think.
customer_reviews.author: Melody A.

customer_reviews.title: Cat and I are very happy.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this litter box, but most important so does my cat. I have a really long cat and as he's getting older he's not as limber, the cut out entrance is very helpful. There is a little marking on the side that tells you how much litter to add so you don't under or over fill. It's really easy to completely clean which I do every 3 weeks, the litter does not stick. Oh, the sides are higher then most boxes so that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Improved Cat Litter Box
customer_reviews.text: The main reason for my buying this box is 95% true. My cats urine almost never sticks to the side very hard. So I do like this litter box but it does have some problems. The curved corners make it hard to scrap clean. The small entrance meant I needed to turn it backward to keep litter from being scraped out by my cats. (I thought the size was going to be good for my older cats but - they are able to climb over the high end.) So it is definitely worth its price but there are problems.
customer_reviews.author: singnote

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and NOT as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Wish we could give zero stars. We had high hopes for this product. That changed as soon as we received it. There were numerous scratches on the bottom of the pan, as if it had been used already. At $40, way too expensive for such a shoddy product.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Danville

customer_reviews.title: Best Product Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've had many cats over many decades. And so, I've also had many different brands of litter boxes as well. This PetFusion Large Litter Box is the best ever! I have four indoor cats and bought three boxes. There is nothing to clean up. Nothing, I mean, nothing sticks to the inside of these litter boxes. I also bought their scoop, which nothing will stick to. I empty the entire litter box the first of every month and add new clean litter. But instead of having to clean out the box first, now all I have to do is wipe out the box with a dry rag and add litter. HIGHLY, HIGHLY Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: This was a low priority delivery during Covid, but the product was well worth the wait. The litter (I use crystals, not clumping) really does not stick to the pan! The pan is so sturdy it can carry the crystals across the room and it does not bend or flex. Clean-up is easy due to the non-stick feature. It is easier for my aging cat to exit the pan, unfortunately this means she tracks more litter on her feet. I wondered about the price when I purchased it, but this was the only pan with smooth edges all the way around the top. Another plus, it's not made in China. I would definitely buy this litter pan again.
customer_reviews.author: NancyCats

customer_reviews.title: Non stick great but litter everywhere
customer_reviews.text: The non stick works amazingly. Doesn't necessarily make cleaning easier. I'm spending MORE time cleaning because you must be extra careful to prevent litter from flying out. The litter slides around VERY easily, maybe too easy. The entry is really low. Again, must be extra careful not to slide litter up too high while scooping and splash it out, pretty easy to make a mess. Though vets "recommend" open top litter box, cats toss litter everywhere. It's not at all easy or practical to manage. I was quickly reminded why I switched to covered litter box years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Mebobbob

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy box but only kind of non stick.
customer_reviews.text: I have four indoor cats so I bought two boxes. These boxes are huge, much bigger than I thought but that's perfect for me. It is also built really well. The large size keeps a lot more of the litter in the boxes and has eliminated pee going out of the box. The very first time I cleaned it the box noting stuck t the bottom. Now after about two months of use the Tidy Cats clumping litter does stick to the bottom. However, it comes off pretty easy with gentle pressure with the scoop. My old box was really hard to clean. This is a huge improvement but not totally non-stick.
customer_reviews.author: Zachri S.

customer_reviews.title: I love it and so does my cat
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the same old litter box for years with my 11 year old cat. I always had to scrape the clumps off the sides and bottom and some of it would stick. I had to do a deep clean and replace the litter more often becuase the clumps would stick to it. With this new nonstick litter box, I'm able to get the whole clump without any scraping and it leaves the box and remaining litter super clean. I put it next to my cat's old box thinking he'd need some time to get used to it, but from day one he's actually preferred this new one to his old box!
customer_reviews.author: AshFinny

customer_reviews.title: If you clean a litter box - you will LOVE this one.
customer_reviews.text: When 'clumped' litter sticks on the bottom of a litter box, it breaks into a million pieces when you scoop. BUT - with this litter box, I was AMAZED to find that the litter RARELY sticks to the bottom. Which means, I can easily clean up the lumps, leaving CLEAN litter behind. IT IS WONDERFUL!!! Side bar - I have 4 cats sharing the same litter box. (Yes - I do poop scoop a LOT); but this litter box is the BEST one I've come across in 45 years; and I am a totally clean freak. If you have better things to do than clean litter - buy this box. You will be glad you did. :)
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: These are Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My husband cleans our cats' litter boxes and is extremely happy with the way these non-stick boxes work. One of our cats apparently decided to take up plastering in his spare time and the boxes became impossible to clean, even with a chisel! We tried numerous litter boxes before finding these. None of the earlier ones cleaned easily, but these do exactly as described. They really are non-stick! They also are big and sturdy, which means litter doesn't fly all over the place when the cat excavates. These fully deserve five stars!
customer_reviews.author: MossRose

customer_reviews.title: Great For Large Cat!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of this box for my 22 lb cat. Easy to clean and scoop. Nice high sides to keep her from pooing over the side with a low entry point in front, which makes it easier for older cats. Definitely non-stick, dry cat litter really slides around inside. Very happy with purchase. I switched from an expensive Modkat enclosed box to this one, and I think the cat likes it better too because she has room to move around and scratch to cover her business. Highly recommend for big cats!
customer_reviews.author: CaliGirl

customer_reviews.title: GREAT litter box
customer_reviews.text: GREAT litter box! Does exactly what they said it would do. My cat, Pebbles is 16 1/2 and was having potty issues. Hard for her to get in and out and wasn't able to turn around and cover things so she just left it sitting. Not anymore! She goes in and out and covers everything! The pan coating is amazing! The litter does not stick to it! Just scoop and go. I am thinking about going back and ordering the scooper that they have for this box. It's a whole new world in my house!! Thank you so much! Ann Marie, CT
customer_reviews.author: Pebbles Mom

customer_reviews.title: Right size for two cats
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my two large cats (13lbs and 14lbs). This is the 4th litter box attempt and hopefully the last. They were peeing outside of the old boxes and this one is large enough to give me time to empty it onece a day. The others were too small. I bought a dome as well, and although it was big, they didn't like the enclosure capturing the smell, so again they would pee outside.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: The Rolls Royce of Litter Boxes
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this litter box is HUGE! And the non-stick coating works incredibly well. You don't have to dig out the corners and scrap up stubborn bits. It feels like a lot for a litter box, but since my cats will hopefully live 15 years or more, and I'll be cleaning this thing out every single day of those years, I think it's worth paying more, if you can swing it, for a litter box that will make your life a little easier on a daily basis. Plus I'm sure my cats are happy to suddenly have a litter box double the size of the one they are used to.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money like I did
customer_reviews.text: I hate everything about this litter box, and so does my cat. It’s no easier to clean than a normal $20 box. My cat constantly pees over the low side onto the floor. Probably because the corners are sloped - for this reason, it’s also more difficult to clean. I also find myself having to clean it twice as often as any other box I’ve owned. Non-stick it is not. Also, my first box arrived cracked, and returning it was a pain - I also have no idea why I was forced into to return a broken item that couldn’t be resold.
customer_reviews.author: ALISON

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Hi priced, but works great. Very easy to clean and is a large size so cat has plenty of room to do his business. Nice gray color blends in with the litter and room. Glad I bought this item. Only thing I don’t like is the ridge around the bottom, not easy to scoot back and forth to even out the litter. Would rather have a smooth bottom. Buy one, you’ll like it.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Bardsley

customer_reviews.title: Yes they are expensive, but totally worth it - specially for edge of pan users
customer_reviews.text: These pans are more than your average litter box but they are totally worth it for our household. We have four cats, and one of them enjoys perching at the very edge. When people complain "it's not non-stick" - think of your cooking pans with non-stick coating. It's not meant to fall back in to the pan, but when pushed with a scoop it comes off easily. You can't be rough with the scoop, as with non-stick coating it can come off. All in all I am very happy with this purchase, and would get the same to replace if needed.
customer_reviews.author: monerkotha

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey for a litter box, BUT it works wonders with scooping up the pee. I have a cat who’s in beginning stages of kidney disease and he goes pee all the time and likes to use the front of the box and not cover it up. It was really hard to scrape up regularly and then I bought these litter boxes (2) and it’s super quick and easy and uses less litter cause it clumps better too. It’s worth trying and you can always send it back. It doesn’t have a lid but there hasn’t been anymore of a mess, and maybe even less than my old covered litter box.
customer_reviews.author: janice werder

customer_reviews.title: It's nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I've been totally disappointed in this product. Cat waste does stick to the bottom of the litter box. The high sides are a good idea. I was really looking forward to getting a non-stick litter box but NOPE. As far as I'm concerned, it's very over priced as is.
customer_reviews.author: Mockingbird

customer_reviews.title: Well designed....but NOT non-stick..!!
customer_reviews.text: Well designed....sides not too high or low...large size...sturdy plastic....best shaped and sized litter box I have found...BUT... Big globs of urine-soaked litter STICK to bottom and sides every time from the very first use.... Note I have 4 of these litter boxes purchased at different times from different vendors. ..I use Tidy Cats Free & Clear (unscented clumping) and Dr. Elsey’s Ultra Clumping litters. Both of these stick badly on these otherwise wonderful litter boxes. Claims of non-stock performance were clearly false in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: I love this box.
customer_reviews.text: This was an expensive leap for me, since until I had it it looked like a larger version of a regular box, but until I had it I didn't realize that other litter boxes were flimsy. This one's solid. I usually just pretend that my litter box is merely a practical item rather than an eyesore, but this one manages to fit that. It's not attractive or anything, but it doesn't make me cringe. Coating & rounded corners, lack of seams all make it easy to keep clean (but don't leave it for a month & expect not to have to wipe it). My cat didn't blink at the change in box.
customer_reviews.author: VideoWriter

customer_reviews.title: This does not live up to its promise at all! Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Although the vendor said "Non-stick coating reduces sticking up to 70%" in fact it didn't reduce sticking at all. Silly me, I believed the description and ordered two of these litter boxes only to find that the litter stuck to the box as much as any of the less expensive ones have. I have to work at scraping the clumps of litter off the bottom and sides of the box, exactly the opposite of what I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Ashmun

customer_reviews.title: Easy Cleaning! Not!
customer_reviews.text: We like the box - size is ok - could be a little larger - but best part is it very easy to clean! UPDATE (1) MONTH LATER - things are starting to stick to surface, as bad or worse than a cheaper pan. Don't waste your money on this expensive pan - its all smoke & mirrors advertising! Cannot recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Steverino

customer_reviews.title: Sticks to pan like cement
customer_reviews.text: Didn't change the litter brand or scooper. Some how this litter box makes the harder to scoop. It does the exact opposite of what it says. I'm basically breaking the scooper trying to disconnect it from the litter pan. I will see if the Arm&Hammer Slide will make it easier to scoop now that I've purchased this
customer_reviews.author: Esha

customer_reviews.title: better is better
customer_reviews.text: I have several cats and usually clean the litter boxes everyday and sometimes twice a day. My cats, like most, like a clean litter pan and these pans are easy to clean, after hard use for two weeks I noticed that they are not quite as 'slick' as originally but I do like them and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: This box, and a metal poop scoop have changed the cat poop aspects of my life. It is not perfectly non-stick (sticks a little in the front) but usually I tilt the box forward, scoop, tilt it backward, scoop again, and that’s it. No scraping, no prying cat poop out of corners. The rounded corners, high sides, and sturdy construction make This the PERFECT litter box. Get one for all your cat lover friends and relatives for Christmas! Along with a metal scoop....
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Non stick cat box, how did I ever live without it?!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, so glad I bought these! We moved to a new house and I bought two other boxes which were not non stick. They were also too small. When I saw these, which had higher sides and were much larger, I decided to go for it and also...non stick! I am now a firm believer that this is the way to go. It was always a chore trying to scrape off the clumping litter from the old style boxes. Now it all just slides off, easy to get the scooper under it all. Will never buy anything but non stick again in a cat litter box!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: These certainly start out easy to clean and are still somewhat easy to clean after months of scratches. However, I really wish someone would offer a powder coat version or a trunk liner spray version that holds up longer. These are pretty spendy, and we now own six so we can rotate in a clean one w/out having to clean the old one right away. We also wish there was an option to raise the side walls as cats find a way to go over the edge, creating quite a mess.
customer_reviews.author: WalkerBowe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome litter box, scoop fork too! 4 paws up!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3-legged cat and a 17-year-old, both of whom have had difficulty with the different boxes I tried. While ordering 2 boxes I decided to try the litter scoop too (I have about 8 different kinds/prices. It's a wee pricey, but is it worth every penny!!! It doesn't bend when you don't want it to, does a great job on the slick bottom of the pan, and saves on litter. Litter cleaning is a breeze with this box and scooper combo, no matter what kind of litter you use! Take it from an animal rescuer who has dealt with hundreds of cats! You won't regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Joan P

customer_reviews.title: PetFusion XL Cat Litter Box
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to the cat owner scene, but good lord this box is enormous. Immediately after receiving it, I was taken aback by its sturdy, proper construction and the sheer size of it. The walls are made of thick ABS plastic and have curved edges at the bottom, so filling the litter up to the line may look like nothing is in there but be not deceived, fellow cat owners. The design is excellent for cats that like to dig, make a mess, or like higher walls to jump out of. It’s pretty light, perfectly easy to clean and has a good aesthetic for a large gray box. Absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing coated finish litter box.
customer_reviews.text: The coating on this litterbox is amazing. I always had to soak and scrub my old litterboxes outside to remove stuck on matter. That was very difficult in freezing Midwest winters so I would put a liner. Liners are also messy and a real pain. This coated litter box really is the answer. No more stuck on matter, it slides right off. I plan on ordering a second. Also a good size and height for geriatric cats. Large, low entry opening.
customer_reviews.author: T. DeGuelle

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT Litter Box... GREAT Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this box in Feb. '17 and after about a year or so the coating began to peel. I contacted the manufacturer and they immediately replaced, even after my warranty had expired, with a new improved box. EXCELLENT customer service!!! This box is VERY easy to clean and large size keeps the litter in!
customer_reviews.author: PHP

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had known about these litterboxes years ago. They're on the pricey side but we have six cats and cleaning their old litterboxes was a nightmare. It was impossible to get the clay litter off of the inside no matter how much scrubbing we did. These are absolutely no problem - everything just slides out, and on the occasion something gets stuck, it can be wiped away without much hassle. They've definitely been worth it for our household.
customer_reviews.author: Tarz

customer_reviews.title: If cat's pee isn't completely dry it will stick to box
customer_reviews.text: My cat sits to pee in the same location and sometimes it doesn't get enough time to completely dry and form into clumps. It is like cement on the side and bottom of the box and nearly impossible to scrape off. I worry that I might be scratching the non-stick surface. I was hoping that the "non-stick" surface pertained to wet litter also. I wrote the manufacturer about this and they quickly sent me another one. Unfortunately the same problem happens. So, customer service is great. But, under certain conditions (like my cat's peeing habit) the non-stick doesn't work well.
customer_reviews.author: luciellenc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 2 cats...
customer_reviews.text: I have been a cat widower for over 5 months, so I ordered this box as my old one had been through 5 cats over time. I just adopted two sister cats from the same litter from Citizens For Animal Protection, and they love it! I love it, nothing sticks! What a concept for cat lovers. Buy one, you'll see.
customer_reviews.author: TexasDoug

customer_reviews.title: Square scoop in rounded off box
customer_reviews.text: The cat is fine with this but I hate it. 2 stars because it is "nonstick" as advertised and that is a cool feature but it is a nightmare to clean. The edges are rounded off way too much. Not possible to scoop the corners well. Maybe with a more rounded scooper, but the one they sell with the box is squared off. It's on the porch just in case she won't use the one I just replaced it with. But as soon as she does, it's out of here.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic litter pan!
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple cats and most litter pans that are large crack easily. This one is nice and sturdy. The size is great for multi cat households. It cleans like magic! Other plastic pans get scratched up and then absorb odors, making it impossible to feel like they are really clean but the litter just rolls off this one like magic. So far, no scratches! I don't use clumping litter. I use clay so I can't speak for the clumping but other reviews say it works for that, too. I guess my legacy is going to be I am a litter pan connoisseur! Yuck!
customer_reviews.author: JKL

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best litter pan I've had in my home! It's super easy to clean, making it much less of a chore to scoop. Daily scooping keeps my old boy from seeking out other areas (i.e. rugs and furniture) to pee on. It's a good size and still fits into the cat furniture (end table) I use to conceal it. Because of the non-stick coating, my cat, who tends to scratch the inside walls of his litter box, doesn't cause any damage to it. I can honestly say I wish I'd found this years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: These boxes are great. Our cats have become spoiled and refused to use the regular size box after replacing a broken one with an extra large size. Sometimes they still step out the tall sides or kick litter out the front, but that’s expected. I did make sure to get a coated scoop with rounded corners to prevent the scratching of the non stick coating.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smart

customer_reviews.title: Not no stick but good design and quality
customer_reviews.text: So like it seems pretty much everyone else I use the clay litter. In no way was this box no stick with the clay litter. That said it's the perfect size and design for cats - high enough sides, open top, low entry - and good quality that I am keeping it. Short version: if you're stuck on no stick (ha ha) this is not the box for you but if you're looking for a box your cats will USE - this is the box for you.
customer_reviews.author: Lady J, Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Good litter box
customer_reviews.text: This litter box is sturdy, very easy to clean, and it really is non stick. I’ve had it for about two months and hope the nonstick coat will last. My cat loved it instantly, she is older and overweight but has no problem getting in and out. Overall - a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DMS

customer_reviews.title: Non stick wears off fast
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this box for about two months now. At first it was great, but the non stick has already worn off and is now sticking to the bottom. To me this is just an overpriced regular litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Better than hooded litter boxes
customer_reviews.text: No sticking! This is a really great product. I transitioned from a "hooded" litter box. I was apprehensive because I thought the sides would be too low and there would be litter everywhere. We have had this litter box for a month and I am really glad we made the transition. This is a much better choice. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: MelB

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about this product, but indeed clumps of dirty litter slide off the litter box much easier! I did notice that there's a fill line in the litterbox which makes me think that only the bottom third of the litter box has the non-stick coating. I do worry about scraping off the coating with their non-stick scooper (see my review). It has rather sharp teeth on the end, so I try to scoop as gently as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Green

customer_reviews.title: The best cat boxes we've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I've had auto boxes and I hated them, they were not easier to clean, they were harder to clean than just a regular box. Litter stuck to the boxes, they would get blocked up, etc.... These boxes are the bomb. They are sturdy, large, easy for kitties to get in and most importantly the litter slides right into your scooper. I recommend these for all kitty owners, if you are tired of "automatic" boxes and boxes that the litter sticks to, these are for you. Thanks guys.
customer_reviews.author: vc

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a great litter box for my two senior cats. They seem to have a hard time getting in and out. This is low enough for them to get in and out of but the sides are not high at all. My old litter box was actually better but I am now stuck with this. I couldn't imagine sending this back. My problem is they seem to kick so much litter out so the sides were important to me.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Thompson and Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: NOT for senior cats, not as low rise as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I needed to get my 12 1/2 year old a low front entrance litter box with higher use walls, the front still had quite the height to it that would cause a strain to her joints.. also seemed very narrow as well, not enough width for a cat to move around to find their spot to urinate etc. it’s more of a straight in, straight out type of movement support which doesn’t work for me unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Justina

customer_reviews.title: Litter box cleanup is almost fun.
customer_reviews.text: Best litter box I ever owned! We have 2 cats and this box is great. No more worries about them accidentally missing box or throwing litter outside box. Cleaning it out is a dream compared to old boxes. Non-stick finish and rounded corners makes scooping almost effortless. Full disclosure - I purchased box during deal which saved $10. I may not have purchased at full price before realizing why this box received so many positive ratings. It is worth the price and I would purchase another - even at full price!
customer_reviews.author: 2BHonest

customer_reviews.title: My cat has happy poops
customer_reviews.text: After researching many litter boxes it was apparent that open litter boxes are the best for cats. With my past cat we used a liner, so the idea of a cat litter box with no liner interested me. It actually works really well!! I’ve had it for a couple months now and nothing sticks to it. Very easy to clean. No smells. Pleasing to look at (aka not an eye sore). Definitely go for this one over the self cleaning ones.
customer_reviews.author: N. H.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to get excited about a litter box. However, when I saw this box from PetFusion I was. I have already purchased 2 of the coated litter scoops and absolutely love them so I knew I wouldn't be dissapointed with this box. This box is as described. I purchased 2 of these boxes and I expect them to hold up nicely for the 6 months I keep a litter box before replacing it. With 4 cats it doesn't matter how fantastic your boxes are, they will absorb some odor. Remember to wash & deodorizer your litter boxes weekly and replace them every 6-12 months.
customer_reviews.author: emmadunkirk

customer_reviews.title: A Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I rarely write reviews. Let me add I have two cats and have volunteered hundreds of hours in an animal shelter. I have cleaned a LOT of litter. These boxes, the wet, used clay litter doesn't stick; as a result clean up is easy and there is far less smell. I've only had these for about a month but so far so good. Provided the coating stays on, I highly, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT 'non-stick'
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, but this litter tray is not 'non-stick' in the slightest. Unless we exist in some Seinfeldian bizarro world, then non-stick in this context should mean LITTER DOESN'T STICK TO THE TRAY. Maybe I'm just delusional, and my brain is incapable of comprehending this elevated concept of 'non-stick' litter trays, but I doubt it. I received the tray last night, and my cats have used it several times. Then, shock horror, I went to scoop and the litter was steadfastly stuck to the tray, and I had scrape it off. I am Jack's complete and utter lack of surprise. I'm also pissed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not quite perfectly non-stick, but better than other regular litter boxes.
customer_reviews.text: For the first few cleans (where I totally empty the litter) it was perfect, but after a couple of months of cat scratching I find the damp clumps are now sticking slightly. Only time will tell if this is a great long term investment, or just a good one, but right now the jury is out. Previous litter boxes needed extensive scrubbing to clean every few weeks, this really just needs a clorox wipe or two, to get clean. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Mcmillan

customer_reviews.title: The box has no uncleanable corners and is deep enough to keep the litter from falling on the floor
customer_reviews.text: Used for multiple cats with Tidy Cat Multiple Cat Clumping litter. Both of my babies loved it and their paws stayed reasonably clean when compared with the previous cat box the pets used. To allow them to get used to the new box shape and depth, I set the new box along side of the old box so that the two kitties would not be afraid of the new box because of its slightly different shape and depth. Box is sturdy easy to clean and not overpriced when compared with other cat boxes at pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: D.C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy scoop but pet waste odor amplified
customer_reviews.text: Scooping is a breeze with this non-stick litterpan. However, for some reason the pet waste just stinks more in it (it’s amplified somehow) can smell the litter box from different rooms now and I did not change the type of litter I’m using (and my last litter box was also the “open” type), so it is something about the litter box itself. Bums me out. I love the non-stick surface...but I’m going to go back to my other litter box because it just stinks in here.
customer_reviews.author: Machias Grey

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: Update: It’s been a little less than two months since I purchased this kitty litter box. It no longer Prevent sticking. I am again needing to use two hands. Way too expensive for just another kitty litter box. FINALLY.... I no longer need to use both hands to scoop 'puddies' stuck like glue on the bottom... This litter box is genius.... Many thanks to the person who created this box!!!
customer_reviews.author: K t jackman

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a cat, but
customer_reviews.text: this litter box works well for easy entry and high walls to keep the random over zealous poo covering inside the box. I'm not sure how they make it non-stick, but they did and did it well. My cats haven't complained about the change. I would recommend this to anyone who hates it when poo or pee sticks (come on, we're reviewing a litter box so the poo is the subject).
customer_reviews.author: D Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Large size and Super Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: Cat doesn't care where he craps but I do. The curved sides make it really easy to scoop. The deeper sides means my cat doesn't push the litter out the sides. I bought two so I can clean one thoroughly including washing and have the other all set to go. (pun intended.) Arrived in a ridiculously large box that the cat also enjoyed. Edited to add: It also has some kind of non-stick smooth coating so it's also easy to wipe out. I'm loving them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Manna

customer_reviews.title: Such a brilliant idea!
customer_reviews.text: Granted this litterbox is on the expensive side, but it does everything they say it does. The litter does not stick, it is easier to scoop, the large size accommodates a large size cat with loads of room to spare, yet the box itself does not seem to take over the bathroom space. My two cats took to it right away, no adjustment period whatsoever. I do think less litter gets scattered. All in all the best litterbox I've ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: Every so often, a new product comes along that solves a problem, and you scratch your head saying: "Why didn't I think of that?" This is one of those. It's SOOO easy to clean this litter box because nothing sticks to it. Not only does it make it so much easier to clean, but I no longer avoid cleaning the box as a result. It's also a perfect size for my big boy. He can get into it easily, because it has a dropped opening, but the rest of the box is higher, preventing any spills over the top. I wholeheartedly recommend this product and thank the company that came up with this wonderful solution.
customer_reviews.author: Sunray

customer_reviews.title: The NON-STICK Coating Wears Away
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this is a good litter box. The matching set to scoop the litter isn't designed to fit into the CORNERS! Another thing is that after three months or so, scratches will begin to appear in the bottom of the box from one strong kitty or your necessary scraping when cleaning out the box! The scratches mark into the box, itself, and therefore, the box is not quite all you think you might be buying....litter begins to stick in the scratches and builds up. Also: not a great box for a very large cat.....too small!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Meh
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty excited about this box. I only have one cat but you would think I had several with litter being tracked all over the place . Do looking forward to less mess because of the high sides. Nope. Went out of town for four days( have someone come in daily to check on my cat and do the usual stuff) and was finding litter everywhere .Had to immediately sweep all the the wood floors It’s not that great in terms of the non stick properties either. Had to scrape stuff off the bottom Pretty expensive for a Meh product
customer_reviews.author: Judi B. Kane

customer_reviews.title: Love These Boxes!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this litter box! Just received 2 days ago, and am awed by its non-stick surface. We use Scoop Away Complete litter, and I've spent an inordinate amount of time & labor scraping it off bottom of other litter boxes. No more! I'm ordering a second box for our 3 kitties. 6 months later.........The best investment ever! Even with 3 quite "prolific" kitties, our 2 boxes are still in perfect condition with no damage or scratches to the non-stick surfaces. I highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: R WARNAS

customer_reviews.title: Great: large and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Great large box. Big enough that my cat has room to get in and turn around, and the front is low enough that my 15 year old cat can step into it without struggling. I bought this box mainly for its size, but was delighted to find that it really is non stick, with gently curving corners that it is easy to get litter out of without having to chisel it out and break up large clumps.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: REALLY is Non-stick
customer_reviews.text: We have one (of two) cats who exclusively evacuates on the walls of whatever litterbox she's given. Previously, this made cleaning the litterbox an exercise in patience and upper body strength. Now, it's much easier. I imagine the friction/scraping from regular cleaning will eventually cause the box to be far LESS non-stick, but it will be easy and "cheap" to replace with another one of these :)
customer_reviews.author: clillies92

customer_reviews.title: Best Litter Box!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is old and kept urinating down the side of my last box and onto the floor. He’s stopped doing that since I bought this box! The way it’s shaped is perfect for my little guy and so there’s only one way in and he tends to go further into the box. Also it’s definitely stick free! The waste comes off the bottom so easily! This is hands down the best litter box I’ve purchased. My cat is 17 so I’ve been through my fair share of litter boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick Coating is Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This litter box is expensive but it is the last one you'll need to buy. The non-stick works wonderfully, and the plastic is tough. This size is great for my senior cat, he can get in easily and he has plenty of space to turn around and do his business. Best of all, i just pick it up and dump it all in the trash and it slides out easily with no mess left in the box. I use crystal cat litter, and it used to stick to the bottom of the box when changing it.
customer_reviews.author: AVH

customer_reviews.title: An Expensive Scam.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a Prime customer for quite some time and this may be the worst product I’ve bought. The makers promise a “no stick” surface reducing cleaning. The litter stuck to the box from the first day and has been sticking ever since. I did better with litter boxes half the price. I’ll go back to them. One positive side benefit: I’ll develop some great biceps since I have to scrape the sides so hard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Non-Stick Coating Doesn't Last
customer_reviews.text: I've had this litter box for 4 months now and the non-stick coating no longer works. It could be because I kept using my nice metal scooper and a scooper with the same non-stick coating would have made a difference. It was great at first. Now it just works like a regular litter box.
customer_reviews.author: R Vrataski

customer_reviews.title: great idea too bad finish comes off after just a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: I like this unit, shape , size , sturdiness. I just wished the special finished stay on longer than a few weeks. At two years about half of the unit has no special coating on it. Yes I used the correct and expensive shovel they recommend. Not anymore, now I use a better shovel that removes litter rather then letting most drop through the too big holes.
customer_reviews.author: dadpicky

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of litter! Not completely non stick
customer_reviews.text: It holds an entire pail of clumping litter and shouldn't have to be changed for a while. My cat uses the sides, sometimes I have to move the litter and clean the side so it doesn't stain. Also if he buries toward the low end it gets messy, but I guess that's more the cat than the box. It does look a lot nicer than the old one too.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Ward

customer_reviews.title: No Longer Up there with sliced bread
customer_reviews.text: Now that I’ve had the box awhile I’m no longer impressed. The first couple of months were fantastic - it could be that my cats have toxic pee.... I'm not one to write reviews unless they are negative... this litter box does everything it says it does. Smooth sides that do NOT hold any pee filled litter. Where has this box been all my life?? The cats use it, it is easy to keep clean... winner winner chicken dinner!
customer_reviews.author: LA Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean, Sturdy, Less mess
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to clean - for some reason my cats like to pee in the corner's, which does make it a little difficult, but this product does very well with it. The walls are high which creates less of a mess (if there is such a thing with cats). It is super sturdy - I have a metal pooper scooper that works particularly well with the box. I'd say it's pricy, which when you compare it to a $20 cheap box that you'll have to replace sooner, these are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bratten

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the marketing - NOT non-stick
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these on Amazon based on the company's marketing claim of non-stick, and it is false - cat urine is sticking to the bottom like glue, far worse than my previous litter pans. Also, the rounded shape makes it impossible to get the litter scoop all the way into the corners. The price is massively inflated for what what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Martin Photography

customer_reviews.title: does not stick to walls
customer_reviews.text: WOW amazing product its true about the non stick. our cat has a kidney issue and deings about a gallon a week which equals lots of litter changes. the only time it will stick if I go one day without scooping and it pools then clumps. so it will work wonders if your little one doesn't drink a gallon a week lol. we are extremely satisfied and will buy again when that time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Corina Chacon

customer_reviews.title: Great Litter Box
customer_reviews.text: A nice large litter box, therefore they aren't as likely to pee in the corner. Even if they do it doesn't stick to the sides because of the slick surface. I find it is easier to keep this box clean because of there is less break up of the clumps. I really like this box and my only problem is it's a little on the expensive side.
customer_reviews.author: Gar

customer_reviews.title: Good for older cats
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves his litter box. He is ten years old, and although he is still great at jumping, I can see that he prefers to walk in where it is low. It’s convenient for him, and that makes me happy. Beware, because the sides are not too tall, so if your make cat likes to spray (pre while standing on all fours), you may want to put some posterboards across your wall to protect it from pee. That’s what I do, and it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: ashleyketchum

product_meta.title: PetFusion Large Litter Box (the BetterBox). NON-STICK Coating (FDA, EPA approved) significantly reduces cleaning time. (Vets recommend open top litter box to avoid behavior issues associated with tight spaces and cat's stronger sense of smell)
product_meta.description: Size:Single BoxOur proprietary design & non-stick coating are designed to make your cat's and your life easier. Vet recommended features to promote wellness, eliminate behavior issues, & simply cleaning and maintenance. Premium abs material, safe non-stick coating, & 12 month warranty.
feature_bullets: GREAT VALUE: Bustle.com 2018 Top 2 cat litter pans
VET RECOMMENDED FEATURES: Open top litter box to promote healthy usage (enclosed spaces might cause behavior issues). High walls to contain litter & leaks. Low entry for older cats
SUPERIOR CLEANING & HYGIENE: Non-stick coating reduces sticking up to 70%. Anti-microbial. Less odor
SMART DESIGN: Durable and long lasting ABS plastic. Spacious curves are inviting & make for easier scooping/cleaning. Easy grip lip for all ages
LARGE SIZE & SAFETY: 22.6 x 18.1 x 8.0 inches. All materials tested using stringent international safety standards

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
